fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • Two of the fictional Gorillaz members, Murdoc and Russel, were misnamed as “Murdoch” and “Russell” in a review of the music documentary Gorillaz: Reject False Icons (13 December, page 12, G2). • Jennifer Hudson sings a song called Memory in the newly released film Cats, not Memories as we said in our poetic review (A purr-fectly dreadful adaptation, 19 December, page 19). • Other recently corrected articles include: Turkey renews military pledge to Libya as threat of Mediterranean war grows A tale of two metros: how the London tube beat the New York subway Violence in Paris amid nationwide pension reform protests At 14, I walked through the desert to reach the US. My story didn’t end there
